name: Tic Tac Toe
Description: Tic Tac Toe is a simple two-player game played on a 3x3 grid. Players take turns marking a square with their symbol (X or O), and the first to get three in a row wins.

name: Memory
Description: Memory is a card game where players take turns flipping over two cards, trying to find matching pairs. The game tests players' memory and concentration skills.
